channel.title: Help for rep++
channel.description:
Hello, i have a question
I have now in my 525
0 = normal 1 = moderator 2 = admin 3 = Owner 4 = Donator 5 = Extreme donator
well its fuckt up, i want donator to be 1, extreme donator 2, mod 3, admin 4, owner 5.
And, i want that moderator, admin and owners can do all commands wich donators and Extreme donators can.
Who helps gets rep++

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

What’s the point of changing this honestly lol, there’s no point of changing the default rights. But if you still want to you need to change it client sided and server sided in your commands class. Also you can’t rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

well idk why you wanna make things more complicated but ok you will need to go into commands first and change the processcommands for all rights to the desired number

next you will need to go where ever in a 525 you need to go where it displays the crowns for that rank you will need to change the rights in that aswell to your desired rank

im not that familiar with 525 so you will just have to do a little research of your own

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @soapeater3 soapeater3
item.description:
@soapeater3 wrote:

the rights one should be easy just search owner or something on the files and the second part there should be like isDonator = 0 or isDonor = 0 just change the 0 to a 1 and u need 15 rep to rep someone

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep++
item.dc:creator: @tisko1 tisko1
item.description:
@tisko1 wrote:

I thought people with 10 rep couldn’t rep. Anyway, i’m sure google has an answer. If not, sorry bro:c

Read full topic
